name: Carrot Soup
description: With carrots, fragrant ginger and warming turmeric and a spicy garnish, this soup is bursting with flavour. Add coconut falkes and some chili for more exotic taste.

name: Salmon Soup
description: Salmon stew based on Brazilian style moqueca. Salmon marinated in garlic, lime juice, paprika and cumin, then cooked in coconut milk with vegetables. Add chili for heat.

name: Tomato Soup
description: Our version of the classic Spanish gazpacho! Chilled soup made with ripe fresh tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, celery, and onions. Top up with some pesto and vegan sour cream.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Slowly cooked lentil soup is a culinary wonder â€” it is creamy without any dairy and warmly spiced. Add some cilatro for some extra freshness and chili for the sting.

name: Butternut Soup
description: Butternut squash soup is like a golden pop of sunshine. This soup with sweet apples, garlic, and thyme is the perfect cozy, light dinner. Add cheese if you are hungry.

name: Noodle Soup
description: A spicy mix of gingery chicken and vegetables meets delicate rice noodles in this soup that will warm your heart in a cold day. Add chili flakes for even more heat.

name: Broccoli Soup
description: This creamy vegan broccoli soup is a comforting bowl of goodness full with nutrients and cashew nuts instead of cream. Add some seeds and it gets even more healthy.

name: Ramen Soup
description: Classic ramen soup with pakchoi and a poached egg to add a smooth and creamy addition to the umami-filled flavour of the miso soup base. Add chili to spice it up.
